update SYS_APPLICATION set
NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAMEPINYIN = #{namePinyin, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPDESC = #{desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCRIMINATOR = #{discriminator, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICONCLS = #{iconCls, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER},
TREEID = #{treeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGEPATH = #{imagePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORTNO = #{sort, jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHOWMENU = #{showMenu, jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHOWTYPE = #{showType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENTID = #{parentId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
LOCKED = #{locked, jdbcType=INTEGER},
LINKTYPE = #{linkType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEBY = #{updateBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDATE = #{updateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETEFLAG = #{deleteFlag, jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETETIME = #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select E.* from SYS_APPLICATION E inner join SYS_APP_ACCESS A on E.ID = A.APPID where A.ROLEID = #{roleId} and E.LOCKED = 0 and E.DELETEFLAG = 0
select E.* from SYS_APPLICATION E inner join SYS_APP_ACCESS A on E.ID = A.APPID where A.ROLEID in ( select R.ID from SYS_ROLE R where R.CODE = #{roleCode} ) and E.LOCKED = 0 and E.DELETEFLAG = 0

select E.* from SYS_APPLICATION E inner join SYS_APP_ACCESS A on E.ID = A.APPID where A.ROLEID in ( select UR.ROLEID from SYS_USER_ROLE UR where UR.USERID = #{userId} ) and E.LOCKED = 0 and E.DELETEFLAG = 0 order by E.SORTNO asc

select E.URL, r.CODE from SYS_APPLICATION E inner join SYS_APP_ACCESS A on E.ID = A.APPID inner join SYS_ROLE R on A.ROLEID = R.ID where E.URL is not null and E.URL != '' and E.LOCKED = 0 and E.DELETEFLAG = 0 order by E.URL asc
